app.title: Domiro
layout.sidebar.placeholderBody: Select a section to review its progress and guidance here.
page.input.title: Bulk Domain Input
page.input.description: Paste or type the domains to inspect. One domain per line and we will deduplicate automatically.
page.input.helper: IDN domains are supported and extra URL parts will be stripped.
page.input.label: Domain list
page.input.preview.title: Live Preview
page.input.sidebar.title: Input overview
page.input.sidebar.hintBody: Save first, then continue with DNS / RDAP checks. Refreshing the page will keep your data.
page.dns.title: DNS Pre-check
page.dns.description: Query NS/SOA records via Google and Cloudflare DoH to infer delegation status.
page.dns.export.hint: Export view enabled. Download the latest DNS results directly.
page.dns.snackbar.noInput: Save some domains on the input page first.
page.dns.snackbar.noResult: There is nothing to export yet.
page.dns.table.title: Pre-check results
dns.title: DNS Pre-check
dns.subtitle.line1: Query NS/SOA records via Google and Cloudflare DoH.
dns.subtitle.line2: Quickly separate delegated domains from those needing RDAP.
dns.stats.title: Status summary
dns.table.title: Pre-check results
page.dns.sidebar.title: Status summary
page.dns.sidebar.hintBody: DNS pre-check relies on public DoH responses. Final availability still depends on RDAP / registry data.
hint.dns.title: Notes
hint.dns.body: DNS pre-check relies on public DoH responses. Final availability still depends on RDAP / registry data.
page.rdap.title: RDAP Verification
page.rdap.description: Double-check domains flagged as undelegated through RDAP registration records.
page.rdap.snackbar.noTarget: No domains require RDAP right now.
page.rdap.table.title: RDAP details
page.rdap.sidebar.title: Progress
page.rdap.sidebar.hintBody: When 429 appears the job respects Retry-After automatically. Retry later if needed.
page.rdap.placeholder.noDns: Run DNS pre-check before using RDAP.
page.rdap.placeholder.noTarget: DNS pre-check did not leave any RDAP candidates.
page.export.title: Export & Settings
page.export.description: Download the latest results or tune how Domiro queries external services.
page.export.actions.title: Export results
page.export.actions.empty: Save and run checks first to enable export.
page.export.settings.title: Runtime settings
page.export.settings.dohHelper: Select at least one provider to perform DNS pre-checks.
page.export.settings.providerError: Keep at least one provider active.
page.export.settings.rdapHelper: Current value: {{value}} request(s) at a time.
page.export.settings.whois: Enable WHOIS fallback when RDAP is unsupported
page.export.sidebar.title: Session overview
page.export.sidebar.hintBody: Exported JSON contains every detail without redaction. Store it securely if domains are sensitive.
page.settings.title: Settings
page.settings.description: More customization options will arrive here soon.
parse.errors.title: Unable to parse these entries ({{count}})
dns.detail.unexpected-status: DoH responded with an unknown status code
rdap.detail.status-200: RDAP returned a domain object (likely registered)
rdap.detail.unexpected-object: RDAP responded without a domain object
rdap.detail.unsupported: RDAP is not available for this TLD yet
rdap.detail.network-error: Unable to reach the RDAP service
